summary: The diff updates PortfolioNav.tsx, HeroSection.tsx, and App.tsx to replace 'AR' placeholder logos with tags using alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy'. However, all three locations reference '/assets/image.png' instead of the required path '/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png'. Additionally, there is no evidence that the image file was saved at frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png (no new files were added in the diff).

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image as a static frontend asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff. The image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png is not present.

missing_requirements.requirement: All tags referencing the logo must use the path /assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png
missing_requirements.reason: All three modified files (App.tsx, PortfolioNav.tsx, HeroSection.tsx) reference '/assets/image.png' instead of the specified '/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png'.
